full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: Final Drive, Vehicular - Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**: cb-169-3332760

**Amendment Number**: 12
**Solicitation Number**: W8486-249220/A

**Publication Date**: 2023-10-30
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-05T16:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-21
**Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-02-21

**Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

**UNSPSC Code**: 25173800 - Drivetrain systems
**Description**: Final drive systems for vehicular applications

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Type of Procurement**: Competitive, Open Bidding
**Method of Selection**: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others.

**Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
**Regions of Delivery**: Alberta, Canada

**Contracting Entity**: Directorate Land Procurement (DLP)

**Contact Information**
* Shelley McDonald, Contracting Officer
* Email: [Shelley.McDonald@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Shelley.McDonald@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 598-0508

**Tender Description**: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for final drive systems for vehicular applications. The delivery is requested to 7 Canadian Forces Supply Depot Edmonton. The items must be new and meet the specifications outlined in the tender documents.

**Document Attachments**:A list of downloadable documents has been provided as an attachment to this announcement. 
Please click on the following links below to download the documents.

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23346/w8486-249220-a-final-drive%2C-vehicular-rfp---request-for-proposal_amendment-003-eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23346/w8486-249220-a-final-drive%2C-vehicular-rfp---request-for-proposal_amendment-003-eng.pdf)
* [https://canadabuys.canada
